title: the gargoyle
description:
The gargyole by Andrew Davidson


A porn star and drug addict runs his car into a ravine one night while heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s high.
The car catches fire but he survives, suffering ugly burns to most of his body. 

While recovering in a hospital he is befriended by a mentally disturbed woman who makes a living carving gargoyles.

She believes herself to be a medieval nun and him to be her ressurected mercenary lover. 


gothic horror, love story, historical epic, overwritten and disturbing.
